HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:
Balíkovna na adresu: 79 Kč
PPL: 99 Kč
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2 business days from dispatch. During peak seasons (Christmas, Easter), delivery can take up to 10 days.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The shipping price is the same regardless of the size of the shipment.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing:
Balíkovna: 59 Kč
PPL Parcel Shop: 99 Kč

PARCEL_LOCKERS.cod_surcharge: Included in the shipping price. For COD orders, payment must be made online by card before opening the locker.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store offers home delivery, parcel shop pickup, and parcel locker delivery. PROVIDERS: Main providers are Balíkovna (part of Česká pošta) and PPL. PRICING: Prices are subsidized. Balíkovna pickup points/lockers cost 59 Kč. Balíkovna home delivery is 79 Kč. PPL home delivery and PPL Parcel Shops cost 99 Kč. There is no free shipping threshold mentioned. DELIVERY TIME: Standard delivery is within 2 working days, but can extend to 10 days during peak seasons. NOTABLE FEATURES: The cash on delivery (COD) fee is included in all stated shipping prices, which is a significant advantage. The price is independent of the parcel's size, meaning no extra charge for bulky items. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is consolidated on a single, easy-to-find page ('Doprava a platba'). The details for each service are clearly laid out. However, information regarding express delivery, weekend delivery, and a free shipping limit is missing.
